name: Cyberpunk Justice
description:
This game was developed for the game jam Indie Game Dev Beginners #002

Controls:

  • [A/D/Arrow Left/Arrow Right] Move left and right
  • [W/Space/Arrow Up] Jump (short press - low jump, long press - high jump)
  • [S/Arrow Down] Duck
  • [X/C/Shift] Shoot
  • [7] Toggle post processing
  • [8/9] Volume control

Story:

Justice was once a member of the city's elite cyber police force, tasked with taking down the most dangerous criminals in the cyberpunk city. However, after witnessing corruption and injustice within the force, Justice decided to take matters into their own hands and become a bounty hunter.

Now, Justice uses their skills and abilities as a former cyber cop to track down and capture the city's most wanted fugitives, always upholding their personal code of justice.

Future:

My plan is to gradually add more levels and gameplay features.

The art is available for free from ansimuz

I hope you enjoy the gameplay
Please leave a comment with your feedback
